function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differing sets of communities of strongly connected areas found in weighted networks of movements.","Impact":"Risk of localized disease spread within communities due to strong internal connectivity.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted surveillance and control efforts within high-connectivity communities.","Technologies":"Community detection algorithms, geographic information systems (GIS).","People":"Residents and visitors within high-connectivity communities.","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments."},{"Description":"Spatial differences between returning residents and visitors in community membership.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission between returning residents and visitors in different communities.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health measures for returning residents and visitors based on community membership.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, community detection algorithms.","People":"Returning residents, visitors, public health authorities.","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Stronger levels of internal connectivity through movements within the same communities.","Impact":"Heightened risk of disease transmission within communities due to strong internal connectivity.","Mitigation":"Target coordination of surveillance and control efforts within high-connectivity communities.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, community detection algorithms.","People":"Residents within the same communities.","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments."}]}
